member.name: IPersistSerializedPropStorage2.GetPropertyStorageBuffer
member.summary: Gets the serialized property storage buffer from the property store instance.
member.param: When this method returns successfully, contains the contents of the property storage buffer.
The initial size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by psps
The count of bytes contained in the serialized property storage buffer pointed to by psps.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPersistSerializedPropStorage2.GetPropertyStorageSize
member.summary: Gets the size of serialized property storage data from the property store instance.
member.param: The count of bytes contained in the serialized property storage data.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPersistSerializedPropStorage2
member.summary: Exposes methods to persist serialized property storage data for later use and to restore persisted data to a new property store instance.
